<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/model" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pay="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/payload" xmlns:tns="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/model"> <xs:import namespace="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/payload" schemaLocation="APNPayloadSchema.xsd"/> <!--Here come the Request and Response elements for the Service operations provided by the Push Notification Service--> <!--...Operation registerDevice: This operation is called by the mobile devices themselves....--> <xs:element name="RegisterDeviceRequest" type="tns:T_RegisterDeviceRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request sent by Mobile Device to register itself for receiving Push Notifications</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RegisterDeviceResponse" type="tns:T_RegisterDeviceResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Confirmation for Registration</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--...Operation deliverPush: This operation is called by the sender/appOwner to deliver a Push Notification Message....--> <xs:element name="DeliverPushRequest" type="tns:T_DeliverPushRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to deliver a Push Notification Message to all registered Devices</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DeliverPushResponse" type="tns:T_DeliverPushResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Confirmation of Delivery</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--Here come the Request and Response elements for the admin operations provided by the Push Notification Admin Service--> <!--...Operation callFeedback: This operation is used within scheduled admin process....--> <xs:element name="CallFeedbackRequest" type="tns:T_CallFeedbackRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Initiates a call to APNs for feedback. This returns invalid tokens</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CallFeedbackResponse" type="tns:T_CallFeedbackResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Feedback Response</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--...Operation getRegisteredDevices: This operation is used for admin purposes....--> <xs:element name="GetRegisteredDevicesRequest" type="tns:T_GetRegisteredDevicesRequest"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>returns all registered devices for given Mobile App</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetRegisteredDevicesResponse" type="tns:T_GetRegisteredDevicesResponse"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Devices Response</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--general Result Elements--> <xs:element name="Result" type="tns:T_Result"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generic Result Object holding Code, Message and additional Error Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PushServiceFault" type="tns:T_PushServiceFault"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Generic Error Object holding Code, Message and additional Error Information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--Following are the Type Structures for above Request and Response Elements....--> <!--...Types for Operation registerDevice....--> <xs:complexType name="T_RegisterDeviceRequest"> <xs:all> <xs:element name="AppID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Device" type="tns:T_Device"/> </xs:all> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_Device"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DeviceToken" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="DeviceType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="DeviceId" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Username" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Email" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Phone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Language" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Timezone" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="Info" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_RegisterDeviceResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RegistrationResult" type="tns:T_Result"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--...Types for Operation deliverPush...--> <xs:complexType name="T_DeliverPushRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AppID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Environment" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element ref="pay:APNPayload"/> <xs:element name="DeviceTokens" type="tns:T_DeviceTokens" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_DeviceTokens"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DeviceToken" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_DeliverPushResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DeliveryResult" type="tns:T_Result"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--...Type for common Result Object.--> <xs:complexType name="T_Result"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Detail" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_PushServiceFault"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Error" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--...Types for Admin Operation callFeedback--> <xs:complexType name="T_CallFeedbackRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AppID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Environment" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_CallFeedbackResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="FeedbackResult" type="tns:T_Result"/> <xs:element name="Device" type="tns:T_Device" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--...Types for Admin Operation getRegisteredDevices--> <xs:complexType name="T_GetRegisteredDevicesRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AppID" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_GetRegisteredDevicesResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Result" type="tns:T_Result"/> <xs:element name="Device" type="tns:T_Device" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_MobileApp"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="AppID" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AppName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ServiceGroup" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AppStatus" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Owner" type="tns:T_Sender"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_Sender"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="SenderName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="ServerCN" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/payload" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/payload"> <!--Here come the elements representing an APNs JSON payload as xml--> <xs:element name="APNPayload" type="tns:T_APNPayload"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Root element for APNs JSON Payload</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="APNDictionary" type="tns:T_APNDictionary"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents the 'aps' Dictionary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="alert" type="tns:T_alert"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'alert' Key in the aps dictionary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="badge" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'badge' Key in the aps dictionary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="sound" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'sound' Key in the aps dictionary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="body" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'body' Key child property of 'alert</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="action-loc-key"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'action-loc-key' Key child property of 'alert</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:simpleContent> <xs:extension base="xs:string"> <xs:attribute name="isNull" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:extension> </xs:simpleContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loc-key" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'loc-key' Key child property of 'alert</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loc-args" type="tns:T_loc-args"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'loc-args' Key child property of 'alert. only relevant if loc-key contains respective placeholders</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="loc-arg" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>extra element per entry in 'loc-args' array</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="launch-image" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Corresponds to the 'action-loc-key' Key child property of 'alert</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="CustomDictionary" type="tns:T_CustomDictionary"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Represents an extra dictionary</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DictionaryValues" type="tns:T_DictionaryValues"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element is used as child of CustomDictionary if the custom dictionary holds an array of values</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DictionaryValue" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element is used as child of CustomDictionary if the custom dictionary holds a single String value or as sub-element of Dictionary Values to hold each value</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DictionaryNumber" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This element is used as child of CustomDictionary if the custom dictionary holds a single number.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <!--Following are the type definitions for above elements--> <xs:complexType name="T_APNPayload"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type specification for APNPayload root element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:APNDictionary"/> <xs:element ref="tns:CustomDictionary" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_APNDictionary"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type specification for 'aps' element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:alert" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:badge" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:sound" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_alert"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type specification for 'alert' element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="tns:body"/> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:loc-key"/> <xs:element ref="tns:loc-args" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:choice> <xs:element ref="tns:action-loc-key" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element ref="tns:launch-image" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_loc-args"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type specification for 'loc-args' element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:loc-arg" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_CustomDictionary"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type specification for CustomDictionary element</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="tns:DictionaryValue"/> <xs:element ref="tns:DictionaryNumber"/> <xs:element ref="tns:DictionaryValues"/> </xs:choice> <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="T_DictionaryValues"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Type specification for DictionaryValues array</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="tns:DictionaryValue" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:mod="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/model" xmlns:pay="http://appcenter.audi.de/pushservice/ws/payload"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <mod:DeliverPushRequest> <mod:AppID>?</mod:AppID> <mod:Environment>?</mod:Environment> <pay:APNPayload> <pay:APNDictionary> <!--Optional:--> <pay:alert> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <pay:body>?</pay:body> <pay:loc-key>?</pay:loc-key> <!--Optional:--> <pay:loc-args> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <pay:loc-arg>?</pay:loc-arg> </pay:loc-args> <!--Optional:--> <pay:action-loc-key isNull="?">?</pay:action-loc-key> <!--Optional:--> <pay:launch-image>?</pay:launch-image> </pay:alert> <!--Optional:--> <pay:badge>?</pay:badge> <!--Optional:--> <pay:sound>?</pay:sound> </pay:APNDictionary> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <pay:CustomDictionary name="?"> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 3 items at this level--> <pay:DictionaryValue>?</pay:DictionaryValue> <pay:DictionaryNumber>?</pay:DictionaryNumber> <pay:DictionaryValues> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <pay:DictionaryValue>?</pay:DictionaryValue> </pay:DictionaryValues> </pay:CustomDictionary> </pay:APNPayload> <!--Optional:--> <mod:DeviceTokens> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <mod:DeviceToken>?</mod:DeviceToken> </mod:DeviceTokens> </mod:DeliverPushRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:configuration.scriptText:
assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["X-Auth-Token"] != null assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["X-Auth-Token-Valid-To"] != null
def tokenId = messageExchange.responseHeaders["X-Auth-Token"][0] def tokenValidTo = messageExchange.responseHeaders["X-Auth-Token-Valid-To"][0]
context.tokenId = tokenId context.tokenValidTo = tokenValidTo
def testCase = messageExchange.modelItem.testCase def testSuite = testCase.getTestSuite() def project = testSuite.getProject() project.setPropertyValue( "token_PasswordOnly", tokenId )

con:testStep.name: Copy of SET KEZMOBIL1 TEST CERT

con:config.script:
import com.eviware.soapui.settings.SSLSettings import com.eviware.soapui.model.settings.Settings import com.eviware.soapui.SoapUI
Settings settings = SoapUI.getSettings() //keystore = settings.getString(SSLSettings.KEYSTORE, "") //log.info(keystore)
settings.setString(SSLSettings.KEYSTORE, "../cip/certificates/KEZMOBIL1_MSGTESTUSER.p12") settings.reloadSettings()
